New Records: India dismissed Ireland for just 96 runs, the lowest total in a T20I match against Ireland
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh dismissed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya got a wicket in the seventh over
Jasprit Bumrah struck in the ninth over
Rishabh Pant finished off the chase in 12.2 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and chose to bowl first
The Indian team will field a combination of players, particularly in the batting order, that will be interesting to watch
Post-Match Reflections: Jasprit Bumrah is the player of the match
Rohit Sharma and Rishabh Pant helped India to an eight-wicket win
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's fast bowlers ripped the Ireland batting order apart
The freefall never really stopped as Pandya added two more wickets to his tally and Axar Patel got one in the only over of spin in the innings
